sources.title: A Cuckoo in the Nest
sources.description: Title: A Cuckoo in the Nest Summary: A crowded inn means that a man and a woman must share the same room for a night. One problem is that they are both married - to other people. The other problem is that they used to be ... Directed by: Tom Walls. Actors: Tom Walls, Ralph Lynn, Grace Edwin Production Company: Gaumont British Picture Corporation Release Date: November 1933 (UK) Aspect Ratio: 1.37 : 1 Color: Black and White A crowded inn means that a man and a woman must share the same room for a night. One problem is that they are both married - to other people. The other problem is that they used to be engaged to each other.

metadata.Plot: A crowded inn means that a man and a woman must share the same room for a night. One problem is that they are both married - to other people. The other problem is that they used to be engaged to each other.
metadata.Actors: Tom Walls, Ralph Lynn, Grace Edwin
